text: 158 (one hundred fifty-eight) is a natural number. It comes after 157 and before 159. == In Mathematics == *158 is an even number (it can be divided by 2). *Its prime factorization is 2Ã—79. *Because it has factors other than 1 and itself, 158 is a composite number. *158 is the number of digits in the decimal expansion of 100!, the product of all the natural numbers up to and including 100. Category:Integers
title: 158 (number)
